title: Permanetly suspended
body: I just tried logging on and im permanetly suspended.... I thought the new system was 4 strikes? I had a 25 game restriction but no 14 game restriction and I had thought that i cleaned up my act. Any idea what happened because i didnt get an email either.

replies.body: I seriously havent played in like a year. I always played my games to the end, and generally I mute everyone and just play to avoid conflicts. Decided to pick up league again and it says I'm permanently suspended? Can't understand why?
I got suspended  permently for one game but i got haressment  bye another player end i Em the one that get suspended thats not fair{{item:1038}}

You can always try sending in a ticket. If there's a problem, then the Support team tends to be pretty helpful.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Is it often that they un suspend accounts? I honestly dont know what i even did

> [{quoted}](name=Predatore,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zk8gcjsH,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-10-28T23:08:53.093+0000)
>
> Is it often that they un suspend accounts? I honestly dont know what i even did

Hey Predatore, 

It really comes down to what the offense was and if they can work it out with you. 

Stay positive, Got my fingers crossed for ya :D
